name: Split-it Sky
description:
While flying across the sky, obstacles cross your way. Luckily you have a special power: You can split yourself! Can you beat all 16 levels?

⚡ The controls are simple:

  • [space] to split
  • [double press space and then hold space] to split longer
  • avoid obstacles and enemies
  • destroy enemies by squeezing them

(as demonstrated in the in-game tutorial)

☁️ The game has 16 unique levels and an endless / infinite mode. You can safe your progress on the cloud, so you'll be able to continue playing later. There's also a cloud leaderboard for the endless mode where you can save your score.

⭐ Stars:

  • ~3 stars per level
  • not needed to finish a level, but you can try collecting them for an extra challenge

💡 Pro tip: Change the speed for a faster / slower gameplay!

Music:

  • TheFatRat - Upwind
  • Xaf - Treetan
  • Xaf - Plugged
